"Select the weapon or armor to Grind. <c f0df60>Items that have reached their Grind Limit cannot be selected.<c>"
"Select the weapons or armor to use as material. Selected items <scarlet>will disappear<c> after the Grinding process."
"This is the final confirmation for item Grinding. Check the details carefully, and select \"Yes\" if there are no problems."

"The upgrade of the item $(2) was successful.
The Grind Level increased from +$(1) to +$(0)."

"The upgrade of the item $(2) was greatly successful.
The Grind Level increased from +$(1) to +$(0)."

"The upgrade of the item $(3) was successful.
The Grind Level increased from +$(2) to +$(1).

As the Grind Level has reached $(0),
Special Ability Slots have increased from $(5) to $(4)."

"The upgrade of the item $(3) was greatly successful.
The Grind Level increased from +$(2) to +$(1).

As the Grind Level has reached $(0),
Special Ability Slots have increased from $(5) to $(4)."

"You have selected material items that meet one of the below criteria. Are you sure you wish to continue?

・Items of rarity ★$(0) or higher
・Items that have reached their Grind Limit"

"This will begin the Grind process. Continue?

※You can use support items to increase the chances of a Great Success.
※If the Grind EXP gained exceeds the base item's maximum, the excess will be lost."
"Grind weapons and units, release Potentials, add Special Abilities and more."
"The Item Lab cannot use items in this Storage."
"Select the item whose Potential you want to release or switch. Potential options vary depending on the item."
"This is the final confirmation for Potential releasing. Check the details carefully, and select \"Yes\" if there are no problems."

"You are about to release this item's Potential.
Continue?"

"You are about to release/switch this item's Potential.
Continue?

※You can use support items to perform this process
\u3000without consuming any material items.
\u3000However, Meseta is always required."
"Select materials to use. <c f0df60>Selected materials<c> <red>will disappear after use<c><c f0df60>.<c>"
"This is the final confirmation for making Quick Food. Check the details carefully, and select \"Yes\" if there are no problems."

"Create Food with the following ingredients?

※If you have already created a boost with Food
prior to this, your boost will be overwritten."
"Photon Color change allows you to change the Photon Color of certain items. Please select an item."
"Set the Photon Color. When you press \"Accept\", the Photon Color will be set."
"There are no items that support this feature."
"Select the Weapon(s) you wish to identify. You can use the [Shift] Key to select multiple items."
"This is the final confirmation for identification. You can add your preferred Attributes after identification."

"サービスで、選択した1個のアイテムに
好きな属性を付与できます。
属性を１つ選択後、
「鑑定ボタン」を押してください。
※すべての対象アイテムに選択した属性が
付与されますのでご注意ください。
※対象アイテム10個ずつ鑑定されます。"

"以下のアイテム$(1)個の鑑定が終了しました。
（$(1)個/$(0)個）
「鑑定終了」ボタンを押してください。"
"移植先となる対象のベースアイテムを選択してください。"
"素材アイテムを選択してください。素材に付与されている特殊能力は<c><c ff4f3f>消滅<c><c f0df60>します。"
"ベースアイテムに移植する特殊能力を選択してください。"
"特殊能力移植の最終確認画面です。内容をよく確認して、問題なければ「はい」を選んでください。"

"特殊能力移植を開始します。
よろしいですか？

※付与していない特殊能力は消滅します。
※素材として選択したアイテムに付与している
\u3000特殊能力はすべて消滅します。"

"Failed to implant Abilities.
Please try again later."

"素材として選択したアイテムに付与している
特殊能力はすべて消滅します。
本当によろしいですか？
※S級特殊能力は消滅せずに残ります。"
"特殊能力移植に<green>成功<c>しました。"
"<yellow>オーナー登録が完了<c>しました。"

"The following Special Abilities that
were not passed down will disappear.
Proceed?"
"最大追加数を超えたため、入れ替えました。"
"Replaced a previously-selected Special Ability from the same Category."

"You have Support Items that
can add specific Abilities.
Select the one you wish to use."
"A locked item has been selected. Do you wish to proceed?"

"Set the value of the item
you wish to sell.

※You cannot set a value lower
than the minimum.
※A list fee will be deducted from
your final sale value."
"称号「$(0)」の取得で開放されます。"
"<c f0df61>Open your own shop to sell your items, or buy items from other players' shops.<c>"
"<c f0df60>Search for items that other players are selling.<c>"
"<c f0df60>When you select an item, you will be taken to the shop in which that item is listed.<c>"
"<c f0df60>購入したいアイテムを<%Decide><c f0df60>で選びます。「購入」ボタンで精算が行われます。<c>"
"<c f0df60>プレイヤーIDネーム、キャラクター名、広告文からキーワード検索ができます。検索先を選択後、キーワードを入力してください。<c>"
"称号「$(0)」の取得で開放されます。"
